flawed_nl_solution:
After this summer, she will have twice as many posters as when she had 14, so she will have C + 6 = 2 * 14 = 28 posters.
Thus, Cassidy has C = 28 - 6 = <<28-6=18>>18 posters now.
#### 18

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 22, not 18. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
